chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:

I received the iPhone today,
and on the display, there was a film. This was removed, and various deep scratches appeared on the display.
This does not match the description.
It creates an impression of deception.
The removed film was also photographed and left with the package.

I'm sending the iPhone back and would like to receive a complete refund.

Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request. Can we confirm if the customer is only returning one phone with IMEI 358239129199685? 

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

please check it.

the device was already delivered to you.

Regards,
Ana from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The customer initially ordered two phones IMEI 356310708907269 and 358239129199685, and they returned only IMEI 358239129199685, can we double check with the customer if he only chose to send us back 1 phone for refund and not both?  Thank you for your understanding and patience. 

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

yes, the costumer intentionally returned one of the devices for refund.

Please refund the costumer in the given deadline and keep us updated.

Thank you.

Regards,
Marco from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
